sentences.en: Her mind was slow, truthful, steadfast.

sentences.en: I don't think you are being entirely truthful.
sentences.cn: 我认为你并没全讲真话.

sentences.cn: 我只有一个问题要问你，希望你如实回答。

sentences.en: Maria is always truthful, and anything she says will be accredited.

sentences.en: Ruth is always truthful and anything she says will be accredited.

sentences.en: The smile of a philanthropist may be truthful.
sentences.cn: 慈善家的笑或许是真诚的.
